name: PB&J Sandwich
instructions: Spread peanutbutter and jelly on two pieces of bread. Enjoy!

name: Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, pizza sauce, cheese and other desired toppings.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Roll out pizza dough, spread desired amount of sauce, then add cheese and other toppings. Bake for 25 minutes or until crust is golden brown.
